channel.title: [PI] Creating new Degrading & Poison system. *All Re-Read.*
channel.description:
[center][size=36pt]Creating new Degrading & Poison system.[/size][/center] [center][size=20pt]Server/Client Base: Project Insanity 317.[/size][/center] [size=15pt]Overall Goal?:[/size] I am trying to create basically a whole new Degrading & Poison System. [size=15pt]Problem?:[/size] I have absolutely [b]no[/b] idea where to start. [size=15pt]Description example:[/size] I will have ALOT more uses for it than just this but this is my first example; I want to have a item that runs on its own "Degrading" system, and after you buy it [size=14pt]!ONCE![/size] from any shop [size=14pt][b]or[/b][/size] player then it does something to your character that you cannot go (random(misc)15-30 minutes without having this item equipped. But the item "Degrades" within (random(misc)5-10 minutes. Then I want a brand new "Poison" system, where the poison ONLY effects you if you have bought the item I described at least [size=14pt]!ONCE![/size] from a shop [size=14pt][b]or[/b][/size] player. But if you wield the item, then it cures you UNTIL it "degrades" then you are poisoned again. I would LIKE for the poison to hit a "9" on you every 60 seconds.
P.S. If anything is unclear please feel free to quote the part that is unclear and ask me about it. ___________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ This is something I would really like to have help on, I [size=20pt]DO NOT[/size] expect to be "Spoonfeed", I would simple just like assistance. ___________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ ALRIGHT, Please no spam. Let's stay on topic and make this a learning/helping environment, any help is appreciated and encouraged. ___________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ This really isn't as big and scary as it looks.... It's just with the Degrading system, I need to make it where a item only has a certain time limit before it disappears. Then with the poisoning system, it's just if you have bought a item at least once before then your character is PERMANENTLY poisoned without that item wielded. I just need a little help with codes and placing.
